xs:element.name: SubReportInformationList

ReportTitle.StrSql: select dept_name, one, two, three, four, five,six,seven from (SELECT a.DEPT_NAME, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '08:30' THEN '小于8:30' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '08:45' THEN '8:30——8:45' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '09:00' THEN '8:45——9:00' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '09:15' THEN '9:00——09:15' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '09:30' THEN '9:15——09:30' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '10:00' THEN '9:30——10:00' ELSE '10:00以后' END KTSJ, COUNT(*) sl FROM v_operation_master_v2 a WHERE A.SEQUENCE = 1 AND A.OPER_STATUS_CODE > 35 and a.start_date_time >= :STARTTIME and a.start_date_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) AND (a.dept_code like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%' or :vdeptcode is null or a.dept_name like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%') GROUP BY a.DEPT_NAME, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '08:30' THEN '小于8:30' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '08:45' THEN '8:30——8:45' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '09:00' THEN '8:45——9:00' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '09:15' THEN '9:00——09:15' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '09:30' THEN '9:15——09:30' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '10:00' THEN '9:30——10:00' ELSE '10:00以后' END) pivot(sum(sl) for ktsj in('小于8:30' one, '8:30——8:45' two, '8:45——9:00' three, '9:00——09:15' four, '9:15——09:30' five, '9:30——10:00' six, '10:00以后' seven)) order by dept_name

select a.patient_id, A.VISIT_ID, A.OPER_ID, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age, a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.in_date_time, 'hh24:mi') intime, to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'hh24:mi') anestime, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a WHERE A.SEQUENCE = 1 AND A.OPER_STATUS_CODE > 35 and a.start_date_time >= :STARTTIME and a.start_date_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) AND (a.dept_code like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%' or :vdeptcode is null or a.dept_name like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%') and a.dept_name = :VDEPTNAME

select a.patient_id, A.VISIT_ID, A.OPER_ID, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.in_date_time, 'hh24:mi') intime, to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'hh24:mi') anestime, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a WHERE A.SEQUENCE = 1 AND A.OPER_STATUS_CODE > 35 and a.start_date_time >= :STARTTIME and a.start_date_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) AND (a.dept_code like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%' or :vdeptcode is null or a.dept_name like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%') and a.dept_name = :VDEPTNAME and TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '08:30'

select a.patient_id, A.VISIT_ID, A.OPER_ID, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.in_date_time, 'hh24:mi') intime, to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'hh24:mi') anestime, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a WHERE A.SEQUENCE = 1 AND A.OPER_STATUS_CODE > 35 and a.start_date_time >= :STARTTIME and a.start_date_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) AND (a.dept_code like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%' or :vdeptcode is null or a.dept_name like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%') and a.dept_name = :VDEPTNAME and TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') > '08:30' and TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '08:45'

select a.patient_id, A.VISIT_ID, A.OPER_ID, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.in_date_time, 'hh24:mi') intime, to_char(a.anes_start_time, 'hh24:mi') anestime, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a WHERE A.SEQUENCE = 1 AND A.OPER_STATUS_CODE > 35 and a.start_date_time >= :STARTTIME and a.start_date_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) AND (a.dept_code like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%' or :vdeptcode is null or a.dept_name like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%') and a.dept_name = :VDEPTNAME and TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') > '09:00' and TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'HH:MI') <= '09:15'
